comments.raw_text:
BeOS5.0.3 net_server
Mozilla/5.0 (BeOS; U; BeOS BePC; en-US; rv:1.4b) Gecko/20030518 Mozilla Firebird/0.6
(pre post from Disreali)
Steps:
1. open bookmarks menu
2. highlight a normal folder
2' see an option to open folder items as tabs
3. highlight the imported netpositive bookmarks folder
3' option from 2 is missing.

[To people reading this bug, if you don't know what BeOS is then you probably
should ignore this bug. To people interested in helping fix this bug but who do
not have BeOS people on irc can help out, this is a code issue which doesn't
actually require BeOS to fix.]
comments.creator: timeless@bemail.org
comments.author: timeless@bemail.org
